title.native: とあるおっさんのVRMMO活動記
title.english: A Playthrough of a Certain Dude's VRMMO Life

description:
Tanaka Taichi is just an ordinary 38-year-old who enjoys video games. He starts a new virtual reality multiplayer game called One More Free Life Online, naming his character Earth. Unlike his fellow players, he decides to master the most menial of skills in the game. He cooks the finest meals, overbrews complicated potions, and hunts monsters with handmade weapons. His fantasy life begins!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Note: The first 2 episodes were exclusively shown as a world premiere during the Anime Messe Babelsberg 2023 in July as a part of a special Anime Panel.
synonyms: Catatan Kegiatan Seorang Om-Om di VRMMO

tags.name: Video Games

tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a fairy.

tags.name: Marriage
tags.description: Centers around marriage between two or more characters.

node.description:
__Machida Touko__ is a Japanese script/screenwriter and series composer.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/sakuribo)

__[Website](https://saji.tokyo/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/saji_official) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/saji_staff/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/sajiofficial)__

__Formed:__ December 2010 in Sapporo College of Broadcasting Arts, Music and Dance, Sapporo City, Hokkaido Prefecture, Japan
__Genres:__ Rock, Anison

__Introduction:__
saji is a Japanese three-piece rock band under record label King Records (2019–), having previously been under TOY'S FACTORY (2011–2016). They used to go under the name phatmans after school, before changing their name in July 2019.

__Members:__
- [Takumi Yoshida](https://anilist.co/staff/162404/Takumi-Yoshida) (ヨシダタクミ) – vocalist, guitarist and in-charge of lyrics and composition
- [Yoshimitsu Yamazaki](https://twitter.com/yoshimitsu_4gen) (ヤマザキヨシミツ) – bassist
- [Shinya Yuutani](https://twitter.com/flying_megane) (ユタニシンヤ) – guitarist

__Agency:__ I'm Enterprise

[Profile](https://www.imenterprise.jp/profile.php?id=30) | [Official Website](https://www.okasakimiho.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/okasakimiho_PR) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/okasakimiho) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miho_Okasaki) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/岡咲美保)

**Non-anime roles:**
• Hator - Memento Mori (VG)
• Anis - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
• Barcarola - Reverse: 1999 (VG)

__[Website](https://saji.tokyo/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/saji_official) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/saji_staff/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/sajiofficial)__

__Formed:__ December 2010 in Sapporo College of Broadcasting Arts, Music and Dance, Sapporo City, Hokkaido Prefecture, Japan
__Genres:__ Rock, Anison

__Introduction:__
saji is a Japanese three-piece rock band under record label King Records (2019–), having previously been under TOY'S FACTORY (2011–2016). They used to go under the name phatmans after school, before changing their name in July 2019.

__Members:__
- [Takumi Yoshida](https://anilist.co/staff/162404/Takumi-Yoshida) (ヨシダタクミ) – vocalist, guitarist and in-charge of lyrics and composition
- [Yoshimitsu Yamazaki](https://twitter.com/yoshimitsu_4gen) (ヤマザキヨシミツ) – bassist
- [Shinya Yuutani](https://twitter.com/flying_megane) (ユタニシンヤ) – guitarist

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/pas_kun)__

__Date of Birth:__ March 6, ????
__Residency:__ Tokyo, Japan

__Introduction:__
Takumi Yoshida is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer and member of rock band [saji](https://anilist.co/staff/141414) (previously known as phatmans after school). 

__Biography:__
He made a guest vocal appearance in the Kagerou Project with the song "Kuusou Forest", which was used as an insert song in the tenth episode of anime Mekakucity Actors. The lyrics, composition and arrangement of the song were all done by Jin, also known as Shizen no Teki P.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/pas_kun)__

__Date of Birth:__ March 6, ????
__Residency:__ Tokyo, Japan

__Introduction:__
Takumi Yoshida is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer and member of rock band [saji](https://anilist.co/staff/141414) (previously known as phatmans after school). 

__Biography:__
He made a guest vocal appearance in the Kagerou Project with the song "Kuusou Forest", which was used as an insert song in the tenth episode of anime Mekakucity Actors. The lyrics, composition and arrangement of the song were all done by Jin, also known as Shizen no Teki P.
